channel.title: The Pod Delusion
channel.description: The Pod Delusion is a podcast about interesting things - from scepticism, the lefty liberal things, it's commentary from a secular rationalist, Guardianista perspective.
channel.itunes:summary: The Pod Delusion is a podcast about interesting things - from scepticism, the lefty liberal things, it's commentary from a secular rationalist, Guardianista perspective.
channel.itunes:author: The Pod Delusion Podcast
channel.copyright: Copyright ipadio - phonecast live to the World, any phone, anywhere2010.

item.title: The Pod Delusion - Episode 32
item.description: Bit of an election special this week: find out what goes on behind the scenes, whether we can reform Parliament. Though you probably only want to hear about Boobquake.

item.title: The Pod Delusion - The Pod Dilution Special
